languages.text: {n}Глаза Леди-Навигатора расширяются от ужаса, и ее тут же сгибает пополам.{/n} "П-прошу прощения, моя госпожа. Несомненно, вы — мой еще некоронованный новатор! Но Дом Орселлио всегда был верен Тисифоне. И отныне — верен ее наследнице, пусть даже вы поведете нас иным путем!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Глаза Леди-Навигатора расширяются от ужаса, и ее тут же сгибает пополам.{/n} "П-прошу прощения, моя госпожа. Несомненно, вы — мой еще некоронованный новатор! Но Дом Орселлио всегда был верен Тисифоне. И отныне — верен ее наследнице, пусть даже вы поведете нас иным путем!"
traits.speaker: CW_NaviTraditionalistLeader

languages.text: {n}The envoy's eyes widen in horror as her body instantly bends in half.{/n} "F-forgive my outburst, my lady. You truly are my Novator, whether or not you have been crowned as one! House Orsellio was always loyal to Novator Tisiphone. Henceforth, it will be loyal to her successor, even if you see fit to lead us down a different path!"
languages.original_text: {n}Глаза Леди-Навигатора расширяются от ужаса, и ее тут же сгибает пополам.{/n} "П-прошу прощения, моя госпожа. Несомненно, вы — мой еще некоронованный новатор! Но Дом Орселлио всегда был верен Тисифоне. И отныне — верен ее наследнице, пусть даже вы поведете нас иным путем!"

traits.locale_text: {n}The envoy's eyes widen in horror as her body instantly bends in half.{/n} "F-forgive my outburst, my lady. Doubtlessly, you are my Novator, whether or not you have been crowned as one! House Orsellio was always loyal to Novator Tisiphone. And henceforth, it will be loyal to her successor, even if you see fit to lead us down a different path!"
traits.speaker: CW_NaviTraditionalistLeader

Henceforth, it will be loyal to her successor, even if you see fit to lead us down a different path!"

languages.text: {n}使節の瞳が恐怖で見開かれ、すぐさま身体を半分に折り曲げる。{/n}「お、お許しください。軽率でした、閣下。間違いなく、あなたこそが私のノベイターです、戴冠していようとなかろうと！オーセリオ家はずっとノベイター・ティシフォンに忠誠を誓っていましたた。これよりは、その後継者に忠誠を誓いましょう、これまでの道を外れるとしても！」
languages.original_text: {n}The envoy's eyes widen in horror as her body instantly bends in half.{/n} "F-forgive my outburst, my lady. You truly are my Novator, whether or not you have been crowned as one! House Orsellio was always loyal to Novator Tisiphone. Henceforth, it will be loyal to her successor, even if you see fit to lead us down a different path!"

traits.locale_text: {n}使節の瞳が恐怖で見開かれ、すぐさま身体を半分に折り曲げる。{/n}「お、お許しください。軽率でした、閣下。間違いなく、あなたこそが私のノベイターです、戴冠していようとなかろうと！オーセリオ家はずっとノベイター・ティシフォンに忠誠を誓っていましたた。これよりは、その後継者に忠誠を誓いましょう、これまでの道を外れるとしても！」
traits.speaker: CW_NaviTraditionalistLeader

languages.text: {n}特使惊恐地瞪大了眼睛，立刻跪在地上。{/n}“请……请原谅我的失态，女士！无论您是否得到了加冕，您都是我的大族长！奥赛罗家族始终忠于提西福涅，从今往后也会忠于她的继承人。哪怕您认为我们应当踏上另一条道路，我们也愿意追随您！”
languages.original_text: {n}The envoy's eyes widen in horror as her body instantly bends in half.{/n} "F-forgive my outburst, my lady. You truly are my Novator, whether or not you have been crowned as one! House Orsellio was always loyal to Novator Tisiphone. Henceforth, it will be loyal to her successor, even if you see fit to lead us down a different path!"

traits.locale_text: {n}特使惊恐地瞪大了眼睛，立刻跪在地上。{/n}“请……请原谅我的失态，女士！无论您是否得到了加冕，您都是我的大族长，大人！奥塞罗家族始终忠于提西福涅，从今往后也会忠于她的继承人。哪怕您认为我们应当踏上另一条道路，我们也愿意追随您！”
traits.speaker: CW_NaviTraditionalistLeader

languages.text: {n}Horrifiée, l'émissaire écarquille les yeux alors que son corps se plie instantanément en deux.{/n} « P-pardonnez mon insolence, ma dame. Couronnée ou non, vous êtes ma Novator ! La maison Orsellio s'est toujours montrée loyale envers la Novator Tisiphone. Je serai donc loyale à son héritière, et ce, même si vous décidez de nous mener sur une autre voie, ma dame ! »
languages.original_text: {n}The envoy's eyes widen in horror as her body instantly bends in half.{/n} "F-forgive my outburst, my lady. You truly are my Novator, whether or not you have been crowned as one! House Orsellio was always loyal to Novator Tisiphone. Henceforth, it will be loyal to her successor, even if you see fit to lead us down a different path!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Horrifiée, l'émissaire écarquille les yeux alors que son corps se plie instantanément en deux.{/n} « P-pardonnez mon insolence, ma dame. Couronnée ou non, vous êtes ma Novator ! La maison Orsellio s'est toujours montrée loyale envers la Novator Tisiphone. Je serai donc loyale à son héritière, et ce, même si vous décidez de nous mener sur une autre voie, ma dame ! »
traits.speaker: CW_NaviTraditionalistLeader

languages.text: {n}La enviada, horrorizada, abre los ojos de par en par y se inclina de inmediato.{/n} «D-disculpad mi arrebato, mi señora. ¡Sin duda, es usted mi Novator, sin importar si se ha coronado como tal oficialmente! La casa Orsellio siempre ha sido leal a la Novator Tisiphone. ¡De ahora en adelante, será leal a su sucesora, aunque nos conduzca por otro camino!».
languages.original_text: {n}The envoy's eyes widen in horror as her body instantly bends in half.{/n} "F-forgive my outburst, my lady. You truly are my Novator, whether or not you have been crowned as one! House Orsellio was always loyal to Novator Tisiphone. Henceforth, it will be loyal to her successor, even if you see fit to lead us down a different path!"

traits.locale_text: {n}La enviada, horrorizada, abre los ojos de par en par y se inclina de inmediato.{/n} «D-disculpad mi arrebato, mi señora. ¡Sin duda, es usted mi Novator, sin importar si se ha coronado como tal oficialmente! La casa Orsellio siempre ha sido leal a la Novator Tisiphone. ¡De ahora en adelante, será leal a su sucesora, aunque nos conduzca por otro camino!».
traits.speaker: CW_NaviTraditionalistLeader

languages.text: {n}Die Augen der Gesandten weiten sich entsetzt, als ihr Körper sich augenblicklich in zwei Hälften biegt.{/n} "V-Verzeiht meinen Ausbruch, Mylady. Ihr seid wahrlich meine Novatorin, ob Ihr nun gekrönt wurdet oder nicht! Das Haus Orsellio war Novatorin Tisiphone immer treu ergeben. Fortan wird es deren Nachfolgerin treu ergeben sein, selbst wenn Ihr entscheidet, uns auf einen anderen Pfad zu führen!"
languages.original_text: {n}The envoy's eyes widen in horror as her body instantly bends in half.{/n} "F-forgive my outburst, my lady. You truly are my Novator, whether or not you have been crowned as one! House Orsellio was always loyal to Novator Tisiphone. Henceforth, it will be loyal to her successor, even if you see fit to lead us down a different path!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Augen der Gesandten weiten sich entsetzt, als ihr Körper sich augenblicklich in zwei Hälften biegt.{/n} "V-Verzeiht meinen Ausbruch, Mylady. Zweifellos seid Ihr meine Novatorin, ob Ihr nun gekrönt wurdet oder nicht! Das Haus Orsellio war Novatorin Tisiphone immer treu ergeben. Fortan wird es deren Nachfolgerin treu ergeben sein, selbst wenn Ihr entscheidet, uns auf einen anderen Pfad zu führen!"
traits.speaker: CW_NaviTraditionalistLeader

languages.text: {n}Elçinin vücudu anında iki büklüm olurken gözleri, dehşet içinde fal taşı gibi açılıyor.{/n} "Taşkınlığımı affedin leydim. Taç giyip giymemenizin bir önemi yok, Rota Reisim gerçekten de sizsiniz! Orsellio Hanesi, daima Rota Reisi Tisiphone'ye sadakatini göstermiştir. Onun halefi sizsiniz, farklı bir yoldan yürümemizi uygun görürseniz dahi size sadakat göstereceğiz!"
languages.original_text: {n}The envoy's eyes widen in horror as her body instantly bends in half.{/n} "F-forgive my outburst, my lady. You truly are my Novator, whether or not you have been crowned as one! House Orsellio was always loyal to Novator Tisiphone. Henceforth, it will be loyal to her successor, even if you see fit to lead us down a different path!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Elçinin vücudu anında iki büklüm olurken, gözleri dehşet içinde fal taşı gibi açılıyor.{/n} "Taşkınlığımı affedin leydim. Taç giyip giymemenizin bir önemi yok, Rota Reisim gerçekten de sizsiniz! Orsellio Hanesi, daima Rota Reisi Tisiphone'ye sadakatini göstermiştir. Bizim için farklı bir yolu uygun görseniz bile artık onun halefi olarak size sadakatimizi göstereceğiz!"
traits.speaker: CW_NaviTraditionalistLeader
